params: SEARCH $root_kind WHERE name = '$dev_list' SHOW  (name or sysname),  scope,  friendlyTime(last_update_success),  (os OR os_class OR #ManagedElement:Management:Manager:.os_class),  (kernel OR os_type + ' ' + os_version OR firmware_version OR #ManagedElement:Management:Manager:.firmware_version),  (os_vendor OR #ManagedElement:Management:Manager:.os_vendor),  formatTime(#ElementWithDetail:SupportDetail:OSDetail:SupportDetail.end_support_date, "%B %Y"),  package_count,  vendor,  model,  (ram/1024),  serial,  processor_type,  num_processors,  cores_per_processor, num_logical_processors, __all_dns_names[0],  local_fqdn,  explode(#DeviceWithAddress:DeviceAddress::IPAddress.ip_addr), #DeviceWithAddress:DeviceAddress::IPAddress.#:InterfaceAddress:InterfaceWithAddress:NetworkInterface.mac_addr,  #DeviceWithAddress:DeviceAddress::IPAddress.#:InterfaceAddress:InterfaceWithAddress:NetworkInterface.interface_name,  #InferredElement:Inference:Associate:DiscoveryAccess.#Member:List:List:DiscoveryRun.cdm_company,  #ElementInLocation:Location:Location:Location.name,  #InferredElement:Inference:Associate:DiscoveryAccess.#Member:List:List:DiscoveryRun.label,  friendlyTime(boot_time),  patch_count,  firmware_version,  firmware_date
SEARCH MonitoredDevice WHERE device_dns_name = '$fqdn' SHOW device_dns_name, entity_id, tenant_id

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT 
          BT_AST_COMPUTERSYSTEM.Name AS `FullyQualified`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Cost Center` AS `CostCenter`
         ,BT_AST_COMPUTERSYSTEM.Owner_name AS `Owner`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Purchase Date` AS `Purchased`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.AssetLifecycleStatus AS `Status`


FROM `AR System Schema`.`AST:BaseElement` BT_AST_BASEELEMENT LEFT OUTER JOIN `AR System Schema`.`AST:ComputerSystem` BT_AST_COMPUTERSYSTEM
     ON ( ( BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Reconciliation Identity`  =  BT_AST_COMPUTERSYSTEM.`Reconciliation Identity` ) AND ( BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Data Set Id`  =  BT_AST_COMPUTERSYSTEM.`Data Set Id` ) )

WHERE 
  (
    (
      BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Data Set Id`  = 'BMC.ASSET'
    )
    AND
    (
      BT_AST_COMPUTERSYSTEM.`DNS Host Name` = $dev_list
    )
  )

params: SEARCH OptimizeSystem WHERE (entity_name = '$dev_list' OR HOSTNAME = '$dev_list') AND BYBENCHMARK_VALUE SHOW HOSTNAME, entity_id, BYBENCHMARK_VALUE

sourceQuery.query: (!status:CLOSED AND !status:BLACKOUT) AND (severity:CRITICAL OR severity:MAJOR) AND (source_hostname.keyword:$dev_list OR source_hostname.keyword:$fqdn)

params: SEARCH MonitoredDevice WHERE device_dns_name matches '$fqdn' SHOW (split(device_dns_name ,'.')[0] OR device_dns_name), entity_id, tenant_id

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT 
          HPD_HELP_DESK.Status AS `Status`
         ,HPD_HELP_DESK.`Incident Number` AS `IncidentNumber`
         ,AST_BASEELEMENT.Name AS `CIName`
        --  ,HPD_HELP_DESK.Description AS `Summary`

FROM `AR System Schema`.`AST:BaseElement` AST_BASEELEMENT RIGHT OUTER JOIN 
     ( 
      `AR System Schema`.`HPD:Help Desk` HPD_HELP_DESK LEFT OUTER JOIN `AR System Schema`.`HPD:Associations` HPD_ASSOCIATIONS
      ON ( HPD_HELP_DESK.`Incident Number` = HPD_ASSOCIATIONS.`Request ID02` )
     ) 
     ON ( AST_BASEELEMENT.`Reconciliation Identity` = HPD_ASSOCIATIONS.`Request ID01` )

WHERE 
        (
          (
              HPD_HELP_DESK.Status  <> 'Resolved'
          )
      AND (
              HPD_HELP_DESK.Status  <> 'Closed'
          )
      AND (
              AST_BASEELEMENT.Name  LIKE $dev_list
          )
        )

params: SEARCH OptimizeSystem WHERE (entity_name = '$dev_list' OR HOSTNAME = '$dev_list') AND BYBENCHMARK_VALUE SHOW BYBENCHMARK_VALUE

sourceQuery.query: (!status:CLOSED AND !status:BLACKOUT) AND (severity:CRITICAL OR severity:MAJOR) AND (source_hostname.keyword:$dev_list OR source_hostname.keyword:$fqdn)

params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) $root_kind WHERE name = '$dev_list' traverse :HostedSoftware:RunningSoftware: WHERE #ElementWithDetail:SupportDetail:SoftwareDetail:SupportDetail.end_support_date AND (time(#ElementWithDetail:SupportDetail:SoftwareDetail:SupportDetail.end_support_date) < time(currentTime())) SHOW  type,  version,  formatTime(#ElementWithDetail:SupportDetail:SoftwareDetail:SupportDetail.end_support_date, "%B %Y"), kind(#) PROCESSWITH unique(0)

SEARCH $root_kind WHERE name = '$dev_list' traverse :HostedSoftware:RunningSoftware:SoftwareInstance SHOW type, version, formatTime(#ElementWithDetail:SupportDetail:SoftwareDetail:SupportDetail.end_support_date, "%B %Y")

SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) $root_kind WHERE name = '$dev_list' traverse :HostedSoftware:RunningSoftware: where age_count > 1 and ((version defined and not version = "") or (build defined and not build = ""))  SHOW type, version PROCESSWITH displayHistory((currentTime() - 90*24*3600*10000000), currentTime(), 1)
SEARCH $root_kind WHERE name = '$dev_list'  SHOW name, logical_ram, num_logical_processors, os_version PROCESSWITH displayHistory((currentTime() - 90*24*3600*10000000), currentTime(), 1)

  "show_rules": false,

  "max_depth": 0,
  "expanding_group": false,
  "show_suppressed": false,
  "annotate_cycles": false,
  "direction": "inout",
  "consider_shared": true,
  "get_related_models": true,
  "set_locations": true
}

params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) in 'Default' Host,NetworkDevice,SNMPManagedDevice, StorageSystem,Mainframe, Printer ORDER BY kind(#) SHOW kind(#) PROCESSWITH unique(0)
SEARCH $root_kind WHERE name = '$dev_list' SHOW (local_fqdn or hostname)
